data.title: Welcome Back BBQ at SCSD#3

data.text:
On Tuesday, August 13, SCSD#3, Arvada-Clearmont School, will hold their annual Welcome Back to School BBQ from 4-6 p.m. on the lawn at the school.

The Clearmont Community Church will be providing free school supplies for grades Kindergarten through sixth grade.

There will also be a preschool/kinder boost parent meeting for ages 0-5 years old, from 5:30 to 6:00 on the same day. There will be an informal meeting and parents can sign up their children for the school’s early childhood opportunities.

A/C School is also hiring several coaching positions, contact the school for more information.

Everyone is welcome to come and meet the school staff and enjoy a free meal.
